title: Bath mat

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a bath mat, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a perspective view of a bath mat in accordance with my new design;
FIG. 2 is a front view of the bath mat in FIG. 1;
FIG. 3 is a rear view of the bath mat in FIG. 1;
FIG. 4 is an enlarged left side view of the bath mat in FIG. 1;
FIG. 5 is an enlarged right side view of the bath mat in FIG. 1;
FIG. 6 is a top view of the bath mat in FIG. 1;
FIG. 7 is a bottom view of the bath mat in FIG. 1; and,
FIG. 8 is an enlarged cross-sectional perspective view of the bath mat in FIG. 1.
